title: Hitachi Energy supports a green hydrogen economy to accelerate the energy transition - Hitachi Energy
summary: Hitachi Energy, a leading provider of sustainable energy solutions, is advancing green hydrogen production and integration into power grids. The company offers expert advisory services and innovative technologies, including grid connection solutions for electrolysers and hydrogen power generators based on zero-emission fuel cell technology.
likely_naics_codes: ['221112 - Electric Power Generation', '221119 - Other Electric Power Generation', '332311 - Power, Distribution, and Specialty Transformer Manufacturing', '335312 - Motor and Generator Manufacturing']
